epic.sir

Class IndividualSimulationState

  • java.lang.Object
    • epic.sir.IndividualSimulationState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    broadwick.stochastic.SimulationState

    public class IndividualSimulationState
extends Object
implements broadwick.stochastic.SimulationState
    IndividualSimulationState class is used to describe what you would like to happen e.g. it is used to request that an agent becomes infected
    Version:
    9 June 2014
    Author:
    Samantha Lycett

    • Constructor Summary

      IndividualSimulationState(Agent iagent, IndividualStateType desiredState)

      use this constructor to record the current state (the fromState)
      IndividualSimulationState(IndividualStateType desiredState)
      use this constructor to set the desired state for an unnamed individual (the toState)
